January 10, 2024

Beta Testing Complete

Beta testing phase concluded successfully with valuable feedback from testers. Several improvements have been implemented based on user feedback.

Key Improvements

  • Enhanced voice recognition accuracy
  • Faster detection processing
  • Better error handling and user feedback
  • Improved user interface accessibility

All improvements are included in the v1.0 release.
